name: TheBoatThief
0:
”Alexa, open the boat thief”
”Alexa, start the boat thief”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the boat thief
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. 
Tiny Girl is a new imaginary friend, in our imaginarium, maybe this could be a GateBox, or some other photonic hardware, but Tiny Girl, lives in our imagination, much like Peter Pan does. In this episode, listen to how Tiny Girl foils the plans of an evil girl you name, attempts to steal a tired backpackers boat.
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
